"From its opening moment when most of the principal characters enter one by one to sing about the beautiful summer morning until its final loversâ€™ clinch sprinkled with Christmas Eve snow, this 'She Loves Me' is a non-stop delight...Laura Benanti and Zachary Levi work triumphantly under the knowing hand of Scott Ellis...Beyond the two leads, the show fairly bulges with star quality...If you want to leave the theatre walking on air in a perfume-scented cloud, 'She Loves Me' is your ticket."
